modules.description: This module implements HTTP client functionality over Eio, managing connections and requests with support for streaming sockets. It provides operations to create connections, send requests with custom error and response handlers, and manage connection lifecycle through shutdown and upgrade operations. Use this to build HTTP clients that integrate with Eio-based networking and concurrency setups.

Handles incoming HTTP connections on a stream socket, routing requests to a provided handler. Works with stream socket addresses and HTTP request descriptors. Useful for implementing custom HTTP servers that process requests concurrently per connection.

This module provides HTTP client and server functionality over Eio, enabling efficient handling of connections and requests with streaming sockets. It supports creating and managing HTTP clients with custom error and response handlers, as well as implementing concurrent HTTP servers that route incoming requests. Key data types include connections, stream socket addresses, and HTTP request descriptors. You can use it to build Eio-integrated HTTP clients that stream data or develop lightweight, concurrent HTTP servers.
